attributes.action: Let primary schools have sports day this year
attributes.additional_details: Let parents watch there kids seeming kids have had a hard enough year!! Remember hands space and face—- but when boris is at the G7 watching red arrows apparently that didn’t apply but again I can’t watch my kids sports day! Makes me sick!
attributes.background:
If 22,000 Scotland and England fans can go into Wembley  and hug , drink, sing in the centre why can’t I watch my child’s primary school sports day which will be less
Then 100 adults there plus social distance- this is disgusting

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual schools.  The Department for Education have set out that there's no legal barrier to holding sports days, including with spectators:

https://dfemedia.blog.gov.uk/2021/06/18/can-sports-days-go-ahead-and-will-i-be-able-to-attend-we-answer-your-questions/
